resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107317</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107317</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205347</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Seeing it My Way</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Es sehen meine Methode</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le voyant ma voie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vendo o minha maneira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vedendolo il mio modo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βλέποντας το ο τρόπος μου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Viéndolo mi manera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will work to recognize constructed media messages, identify the elements that make up media images, analyze the conventions in media messages that create point of view, and examine the different ways that viewpoints position the spectator or reader in different ways.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer arbeiten, um konstruierte 
Mediameldungen zu erkennen, kennzeichnen die Elemente, die Mediabilder
bilden, analysieren die Versammlungen in den Mediameldungen, die 
Gesichtspunkt erstellen, und überprüfen die unterschiedlichen 
Methoden, daß Veranschaulichungen den Zuschauer oder den Leser in den
unterschiedlichen Methoden in Position bringen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants travailleront pour identifier les 
messages construits de medias, identifient les éléments qui 
composent des images de medias, analysent les conventions dans les 
messages de medias qui créent le point de vue, et examinent les 
différentes voies que les points de vue placent le spectateur ou le 
lecteur dans différentes voies.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes trabalharão para reconhecer 
mensagens construídas dos media, identificam os elementos que fazem 
acima imagens dos media, analisam as convenções nas mensagens dos 
media que críam o ponto da vista, e examinam as maneiras diferentes 
que os viewpoints posicionam o espectador ou o leitor em maneiras 
diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi lavoreranno per riconoscere i messaggi
costruiti di media, identificano gli elementi che compongono le 
immagini di media, analizzano le convenzioni nei messaggi di media che
creano il punto di vista ed esaminano i modi differenti che i punti di
vista posizionano lo spectator o il lettore nei modi differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εργαστούν για να αναγνωρίσουν τα 
κατασκευασμένα μηνύματα μέσων, προσδιορίζουν τα στοιχεία που 
αποτελούν τις εικόνες μέσων, αναλύουν τις συμβάσεις στα μηνύματα
μέσων που δημιουργούν το σημείο της όψης, και εξετάζουν τους 
διαφορετικούς τρόπους ότι οι απόψεις τοποθετούν το θεατή ή τον 
αναγνώστη με τους διαφορετικούς τρόπους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes trabajarán para reconocer 
mensajes construidos de los media, identifican los elementos que hacen
para arriba imágenes de los media, analizan a convenciones en los 
mensajes de los media que crean punto de vista, y examinan las 
diversas maneras que los puntos de vista colocan al espectador o a 
programa de lectura de diversas maneras.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205347</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107317</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/seeing-it-my-way</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
